sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_vote ( id char(32) not null, votemark number(11) not null, text varchar2(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, expireddate timestamp, status number(4) not null, groups number(1) not null, anonymous number(1) not null, logging number(1) not null, multiple number(4) not null, description varchar2(256), primary key(id) );
create table sf_voter ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, contentid) );

create table sf_vote_group ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, text varchar2(32) not null, multiple number(4) not null, description varchar2(256), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, text) );

create table sf_vote_item ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, groupid char(32), text varchar2(32) not null, votes number(11) not null, description varchar2(256), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, groupid, text) );

create table sf_vote_log ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, itemid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32), ip varchar2(32), primary key(id), unique(itemid, userid) );
